Articles.Content: 77 f4fs shoot them down with America power (there "might" have been an f-22 involved.)

> 
> Yeah, I'm tired too. The thread is called *King of the* ***Hill***. Not King of the [iNSERT THING HERE].
> Let's keep it to the rules -- this has easily gone far enough to warrant closing as a derailed/chatty thread. Last chance.
> 
> I claim a quiet grassy knoll topped with a small assortment of toxic flowers. It is designated ***the*** *hill*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹. There is to be no other. Bring it on.

Waitaminute ! When I say "I am tired", it was rather a joke. I think this thread just needs to be destroyed/closed and a second one opened to renew it. And most importantly stop megatiger78 from using endlessly his "megaverse" and his "spacemarines". Seriously, he overused them. Even I try to have a minimal amount of variety in my posts.

Although I prefer "King of the [insert]" over a simple hill. It would be boring. And this forum game is the one that holds the most deeply in my heart ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Anyway, I make a hill full of explosive mushrooms, atomic trees and neutronic Flak turrets.

My hill

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-27T21:30:19Z" title="10/27/2014 09:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 27, 2014</time> by MegaUZI**

i just stumbled across this and i just have to ask WTF does this have to do with KSP? lol i nuke all of you from orbit and rather than take the hill i just leave it irradiated as it is apparently some kind of disputed holy ground and im not willing to sacrifice ground soldiers in a futile insurgency suppression effort.

It's a forum game, it does not have to do with KSP in many ways, although posts tend to go towards kerbal space program. It's nice ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I make a hill full of spikes.

My hill.

U iz died.

Me hyll.

All of the hill floats into the sky. It belongs up there.

My sky hill.

I can fly.

And I don't think you can.

\*shove\*

My sky hill.

I go to a space hill

my space hill

I bring your hill back to ground to prevent a mod to lock this thread and conquer it.

My hill.

I kamakaze the hill, killing us both.

Unclaimed hill.

I plant a flag in the hill

My claimed hill

I claim this hill.

My hill.

I jet off to Laythe with a huge telescope and a deck chair on top of a hill, which I claim just as armageddon creates havoc on the hill claimed by MegaUZI

My Laythe based hill with a huge telescope and deck chair

I use HyperEdit to bring Laythe back to Kerbin, fusing them together. The explosion knocks you into deep space.

I plant a virtual flag on the hill. My virtually claimed hill.

I shut down KSP and decide to go out and play on that hill over there.

My hill in the distance.

You live a long happy life, then you die of old age. Salad Fingers finds the hill and builds a house on it.

Salad Fingers' hill.

![233181-1.jpg](http://fallytv.com/showinfo/233181/233181-1.jpg)

A confused slug comes along and eats salad fingers and just like the hungry caterpillar eats the hill as well. I then ask everyone to simultaneously divide by 0 and they explode spontaneously into hill building materials, which I claim.

My claimed hill indirectly constructed by everyone

**Edited <time datetime="2014-10-30T20:31:16Z" title="10/30/2014 08:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">October 30, 2014</time> by ReconXPanzer**

While exploding I make sure that some dust gets into your lungs and cause you to slowly suffocate. I then move my gaseous form towards the hill.

My hill covered in a gas cloud.

> 
> Salad Fingers' hill.

Oh god no. I had forgotten him. I HAD FORGOTTEN HIM AND YOU BROUGHT HIM BACK!

I ignite you gas cloud and it burns away, leaving the hill unscathed.

My hill.

I put your hill on some stilts then hire Chuck Norris to round house kick the hill into the sun. I then build a new hill which I claim as mine.

My hill with a Single Round House Kick to the sun
I send a nuke out of space into he hill. my atoms on a collision course with the sun

An apple a day won't keep ME away! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! 

My hill.

I show you your reflection in a mirror.

My hill.

The HypeAir Flight 25 crashed into you. Directly. And literally.

No one's hill.
\I point out that the last 3 posts are useless seeing as blowing the hill to atoms does not involve apples
